title: 2K Stimulus Checks, Rep. Denver Riggleman
itunes:title: 2K Stimulus Checks, Rep. Denver Riggleman
description:
Guests: Erik Wasson, Bloomberg Congress reporter, Eric Weiner, Bloomberg Markets Live Team Leader, Drew Littman, Policy Director at Brownstein Hyatt Farber Schreck, and former Chief of Staff for Senator Al Franken, Ash Wright, Senior Vice President at FSB Core Strategies, and senior political advisor to George P. Bush, and Rep. Denver Riggleman, a Republican representing Virginia's 5th district.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
